content: and 6 fasten_off and weave in all ends pattern ьу katia glebova 2021 add the eyes to both of your octopus bodies attach eyes between 11th and 12th rounds 1 glued eyes use the ыасk floss thread to give а toy the desired facial expression 1 have embroidered а smile оп both sides му reversiыe octopus is happy 1 decorated the octopus with а bow 1 row 3 chain in 3rd chain from hook 3 half_double_crochet 2 chain si st 2 chain 3 half_double_crochet 2 chain cut the thread pull out the loop using the yarn needle attach the tail to the center of the bow wrap the long tail through the center of the bow secure the thread оп the wrong side of the bow sew the bow to the crocheted octopus please share your creations with me you сап use tag me оп instagram @keti crochet l m waiting for you оп my youtube channel there are many free crochet patterns оп my channel you сап watch а video of crocheting this octopus оп my channel https / /youtu be/ qmjhlhsguys lf you find any errors or need help with any part of the pattern don t hesitate to message me pattern ьу katia glebova 2021
